This page showcases some interactive scenes.

Draggable dots

You should be able to drag the dots around.



Bezier curve

A Bezier curve, determined by a sequence of control points, each of which can be dragged around. This is a technique used for drawing smooth curves interpolated from a finite sample. This demonstration will eventually go into a tutorial page with a full explanation of the math.




Cartesian coordinates

Several scenes including cartesian coordinates.
